Description.Text:
All apartments have air conditioning and heating, WIFI access, seating area with flat-screen TV and sofa bed, private bathroom and fully equipped kitchen with refrigerator, microwave, washing machine/dryer, coffee maker/kettle and all the necessary utensils.
They are equipped with luxury qualities and have all comfort in terms of equipment and soundproofing, as well as a modern decoration.
Apartments Suites Oficentro DELUXE also offer a reception/customer service and clean service in the same building which shall serve any issues that may arise during your stay, as well as provide all the information you need and ensure facility maintenance and housekeeping.
Additional Information: Check-in: From 17h to 20h Monday to Friday. Saturdays before 13h. Check-out: Before 12h * Entries out of these hours must be communicated to the property at least 4-5 days in advance. This can lead to a charge of minimum 20 €. There is also the option of an automatic access without charge. * Reception hours (C. Thomas Heredia, 22-24): Monday to Friday from 10:00 to 14:00 and 17:00 to 20:00 Saturday: 10:00 to 13:00 The reception is closed on Sundays and holidays.
